channel.title: Comments on: Misleading Means: On Drugs and Discrimination

item.title: By: Panic Attack
item.dc:creator: Panic Attack
item.description: This is a really good point. Averages are used so frequently but in reality...how realistic are they for everyday comparisons. Great post. Thanks. Jennifer
item.content:encoded:
This is a really good point. Averages are used so frequently but in reality…how realistic are they for everyday comparisons. Great post. Thanks.
Jennifer
